officers.description: Keeps records and photos of events and activities throughout the year. Network with Asian American Association Alumni to create a resource for current AAA members

Pair up upperclassmen with underclassmen to help adjust transition to campus life and the APA community, as well as organize “siblings” together into “families”, and provide opportunities for Big Sib/Lil’ Sib pairs to develop a strong friendship with one another and their families
Create and coordinate programs and events to educate the members and the community about Asian heritage
To organize and plan a show that promotes AAA, Asian, and Asian American culture and identity
Coordinate with other committees to raise funds to help create a financial foundation for events conducted by AAA

Reach out to the rest of the APA, LGBT, Black, Hispanic and other non-APA communities, through collaborative efforts. Work with other committees such as Social and Sports to draw participation from non-APA communities
Organize volunteer projects that focus on the Champaign-Urbana community
Actively publicize and promote AAA and AAA’s events through various forms of media
Plan and organize activities to provide a social atmosphere for AAA
Organize events, tournaments, intramural teams, and spectator events
